In this Call of Cthulhu scenario, Harvey investigates the disappearance of his friend Nott and encounters a strange, dog-like creature in an upstairs room. Harvey uses his .38 revolver to attack the creature, rolling a Regular success on his attack roll and dealing 5 points of damage. The creature retaliates with a clawed attack, but Harvey dodges it successfully. Harvey then fires multiple shots at the creature, scoring an Extreme success and impaling it, killing it.
